#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t, n;

	long long *arr = new long long[100001];
	long long *dp = new long long[100001];
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--)
	{

		scanf("%d", &n);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			scanf("%lld", &arr[i]);
		dp[0] = 0;
		dp[1] = arr[0];
		for (int i = 2; i <=n; i++)
		{
			dp[i] = max(dp[i - 1], arr[i-1] + dp[i-2]);
		}
		printf("%lld\n", dp[n]);
	}
	delete[] arr;
	delete[] dp;
	return 0;
}
